text: Nde khueŋ kaŋgiri, nza guigira wari won ndavir wari phorgap guigira Zisas khothɨgi gumgi ga ndɨɨi, nza guigira buna guareŋ zɨn vui. Nza maaŋ muunga, nzan ndavi tɨva mbatɨga thueŋ muuŋgi ne suaŋv nza suanga, nza ne suaŋv ndɨkndɨgi vhɨrver muunga fhu. Nza Fhe Bakɨme nɨman rɨvɨrga fhu. Nza kaŋgi, Fhe Bakɨme za mba bigi kaŋgi. Ana ndɨkndɨk, nza ndavi vherir ki ndɨkndɨgi, ana za nta kambarigi.
